title: We need more Behind the Scenes for champions

embed.description: Join League's music team as they hum, compose, and record a song that's worthy of a Freljordian demigod.

body: I just love how the art and narrative team is so committed to their works and how it thoughtfully planned. Your team for me is what makes Riot so amazing and just props to them!

replies.body: Hey, Zeanix! I'm so happy you enjoyed it! It was fun being a part of it and working with the amazing people behind Ornn.

> [{quoted}](name=Ampson,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9qPPE5q9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-12T18:19:29.624+0000)
>
> Hey, Zeanix! I'm so happy you enjoyed it! It was fun being a part of it and working with the amazing people behind Ornn.

Keep up with the amazing work and the team as well!!

> [{quoted}](name=Ampson,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=9qPPE5q9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-12T18:19:29.624+0000)
>
> Hey, Zeanix! I'm so happy you enjoyed it! It was fun being a part of it and working with the amazing people behind Ornn.

I'd love to hear interviews with the voice actors and hear what kinds of inspirations you're aiming for when working on the vocals for a new/reworked champ. For instance, I thought it was really neat that Karma's voice actress mentioned ages ago that she was trying to channel Storm from the 90s cartoons and Gaia from Captain Planet when she was doing the voice for Karma. That kinda stuff is really fun to hear.
I have a feeling certain champions and Regions require a lot more work and inspiration to get their music just right.Freljord is one of them! the themes are just so damn beautiful.
